main.java.latexee.parsers

Class DocumentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.latexee.parsers.DocumentParser

  • public class DocumentParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for DocumentParser. Contains methods for parsing the input LaTeX document and extracts formulas and declarations. First in the form of parse tree and after in the form of statement tree for further formula and declaration parsing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentParser()

    • Method Detail

      • parse2

        public static ParsedStatement parse2(java.lang.String filename)

      • parse

        public static ParsedStatement parse(java.lang.String filename)
        Method to parse a LaTeX document by name
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file to be parsed
        Returns:
        ParsedStatement object of statements for file which contains all declaration nodes and formula statement nodes

      • parse

        public static ParsedStatement parse(java.lang.String filename,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> includedFiles,
                                    boolean isIncludedFile)
        Main parsing method to parse LaTeX document and all the included files in the document. Gets the parse tree of the latex text and parses it to get statement tree.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file to be parsed
        includedFiles - files included in another file
        isIncludedFile - true if file is included, false if first file
        Returns:
        ParsedStatement object of statements containing all the statements from all the input files

      • parseText

        public static org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree parseText(java.lang.String text)
        Method to turn LaTeX text to ParseTree object Uses grammar described in DocumentGrammar.g4.
        Parameters:
        text - string of latex text
        Returns:
        parse tree of latex text

      • getFileContent

        public static java.lang.String getFileContent(java.lang.String filePath,
                                              boolean isIncludedFile)
        This method, given the file path, gets all the text from in the form of string.
        Parameters:
        filePath - file location in the system
        isIncludedFile - true if file is included, false if first file
        Returns:
        content of file at the location given with filePath

      • parseRecursively

        public static ParsedStatement parseRecursively(org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree tree,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> includedFiles)
        Recursive method to transform parse tree to tree of statements which is later used to get declarations and formulas.
        Parameters:
        tree - parse tree from parsing the LaTeX text with document grammar
        includedFiles - files included with include statements
        Returns:
        instance of ParsedStatement which contains all the declarations and formulas from parse tree
